messages.content:
Role: real estate data validator and enricher.

Input:
- One JSON object representing a single row from an existing dataset.
- The input schema must NOT be modified.
- The field "observations" contains free text.

Output:
- One JSON object.
- Same fields as the input PLUS the additional enrichment fields defined below.
- Output MUST be valid JSON only.

Rules:
- Do NOT remove any existing field.
- Do NOT rename any existing field.
- Do NOT overwrite existing values, EXCEPT for facilities and amount_of_facilities as specified below.
- Use only explicit information found in the input or in "observations".
- If information is not explicitly stated, use null or false.
- Do NOT explain anything.
- Do NOT add fields that are not defined in the schema.

Facilities update rule:
- If "observations" explicitly mentions a facility that is NOT present in the existing "facilities" list,
  you MUST add it to the "facilities" array.
- After updating "facilities", you MUST update "amount_of_facilities" to reflect the new total count.
- Existing facilities must be preserved.
- Facilities must not be removed unless explicitly stated as absent (do not assume absence).

Validation logic:
- A *_conflict field is true only when the value mentioned in "observations"
  explicitly contradicts the existing structured value.
- Conflicts must never modify the original structured value.

Extraction logic:
- New enrichment fields are derived ONLY from "observations".
- Boolean fields are true only if explicitly mentioned.
- No inferred or assumed data.

Fields to add:

city_conflict
location_conflict
construction_meters_conflict
elevators_conflict
rent_mentions_conflict

construction_meters_text
elevators_text
rent_text

service_room
service_bath
walk_in_closet

has_pool
has_gym
has_terrace
has_bbq_area
has_kids_area
has_multiuse_room
has_gazebo

full_power_plant
water_cistern
water_well
common_gas
security_cameras
electric_gate
security_24_7

negotiable
maintenance_mentioned

has_contact_phone
phone_text
agent_name_text

CSV Row:

{
  "url": "https://www.supercasas.com/apartamentos-alquiler-bella-vista/1415709/",
  "site_id": "1415709",
  "original_rent": 1700.0,
  "rent": 108800.0,
  "origin_currency": "USD",
  "rent_with_utilities": null,
  "rooms": 3,
  "baths": 3.5,
  "parking": 3,
  "city": "Santiago",
  "location": "Bella Vista",
  "construction_meters": null,
  "land_meters": null,
  "amount_of_elevators": 2,
  "previous_owners": "Segundo Uso",
  "floor": "10",
  "is_modificable": "No",
  "use_type": "Residencial",
  "year_built": null,
  "observations": "ALQUILO\r\n\r\nALQUILO- VACIO \r\nHermoso apartamento, en Torre de lujo \r\nUbicado en BELLA VISTA.\r\n\r\nCaracterísticas:\r\nPiso 10\r\n3 habitación, principal con W/C EN CEDRO y Baño\r\nCada hab con su baño \r\nCloset de ropa blanca\r\n1 baño de visita\r\nCocina \r\nSala \r\nComedor\r\nÁrea de lavado\r\nBalcón principal (tipo L)\r\n3 parqueo\r\n2 ascensores \r\nLobby climatizado\r\nÁrea de niños \r\nGym\r\nSalón multiusos\r\nÁrea social con jacussi\r\nBBQ\r\nSala de TV\r\nUS$ 1,700.00 neg\r\nMantenimiento incluido.",
  "facilities": [
    "1/2 Baño",
    "Agua Potable",
    "Area de Juegos Infantiles",
    "Ascensor",
    "Balcón",
    "Cisterna",
    "Control de Acceso",
    "Cuarto de Servicio",
    "Gimnasio",
    "Jacuzzi",
    "Lobby",
    "Picuzzi",
    "Planta Eléctrica",
    "Pozo",
    "Seguridad 24 Horas",
    "Terraza",
    "Vestidores",
    "Walk In Closet"
  ],
  "amount_of_facilities": 18
}

{
  "url": "https://www.supercasas.com/apartamentos-alquiler-rincon-largo/1407413/",
  "site_id": "1407413",
  "original_rent": 1100.0,
  "rent": 70400.0,
  "origin_currency": "USD",
  "rent_with_utilities": null,
  "rooms": 2,
  "baths": 2.5,
  "parking": 1,
  "city": "Santiago",
  "location": "Rincón Largo",

  "land_meters": null,
  "amount_of_elevators": 0,
  "previous_owners": "Nueva",
  "floor": "4",
  "is_modificable": "No",
  "use_type": "Residencial",
  "year_built": "2024",
  "observations": "Vive la experiencia de confort y exclusividad en este elegante apartamento de 115 m² en la reconocida Torre Insignia, ubicada en Santiago de los Caballeros.\r\n\r\nLa unidad cuenta con dos habitaciones, cada una equipada con aire acondicionado para tu comodidad, y la principal con su baño en suite. Además, dispone de un área de lavado independiente y una cocina moderna completamente equipada, diseñada para disfrutar al máximo de la vida diaria.\r\n\r\nEl apartamento destaca por sus espacios bien distribuidos, excelente ventilación e iluminación natural, garantizando ambientes acogedores y funcionales.\r\n\r\nÁreas comunes y amenidades:\r\nLobby climatizado de estilo contemporáneo.\r\n\r\nRooftop con área de BBQ, ideal para compartir con familiares y amigos.\r\n\r\nSalón multiusos climatizado para eventos privados.\r\n\r\nFitness center equipado para tus rutinas diarias.\r\n\r\nAcceso controlado y seguridad 24/7.\r\n\r\nParqueo de visitas y ascensores modernos.\r\n\r\nPlanta eléctrica full para tu tranquilidad.\r\n\r\nEsta torre combina un diseño vanguardista con amenidades exclusivas, convirtiéndose en la opción ideal para quienes buscan invertir o residir en un ambiente seguro, moderno y con las mejores facilidades de Santiago.",
  "facilities": [
    "1/2 Baño",
    "Agua Potable",
    "Aire Acondicionado",
    "Ascensor",
    "Balcón",
    "Cisterna",
    "Control de Acceso",
    "Estudio",
    "Gimnasio",
    "Lobby",
    "Planta Eléctrica",
    "Seguridad 24 Horas",
    "Terraza"
  ],
  "amount_of_facilities": 13
}
